page.title: 11Fashion in Modern Hereford.
page.content: { Today (1985) people wear the most odd things. Most teenagers of today like to wear up to date clothes. The most fashionable colours are red, black and white. Ski-pants are back in fashion the last time being in the '6os. They are like horse-riders trousers but are black. People today wear long skirts or mini-skirts. Hair styles have also changed. Boys have their hair spiked or dyed. Some even have no hair at all! Girls tend to have long hair. Some have their hair short or permed. Shoes of today tend to be high or have no heels at all. Shoes of today are adventurous.
